## Properties

| Property       | Attribute       | Description                | Type     | Default     |
| -------------- | --------------- | -------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `expression`   | `expression`    | katex expression to render | `string` | `undefined` |
| `katexOptions` | `katex-options` | Katex options json         | `string` | `undefined` |

| Event     | Description                     | Type               |
| --------- | ------------------------------- | ------------------ |
